title: EDLD 651: Introduction to Data Science with R

yaml.title: EDLD 651: Introduction to Data Science with R

markdown.markdown: This is the first course in a sequence of courses on educational data science that will lead to a [Data Science Specialization in Educational Leadership](https://education.uoregon.edu/data-science-specialization-educational-leadership). All courses will be taught through [`R`](https://cran.r-project.org/), a free and open-source statistical computing environment. This course focuses on introductory programming with `R` and [RStudio](https://posit.co/products/open-source/rstudio/), basic data wrangling and visualization with the [`{tidyverse}`](https://www.tidyverse.org/) suite of packages, version control with [git](https://git-scm.com/) and [GitHub](https://github.com/), and dynamic and reproducible workflows with [quarto](https://quarto.org/). ## Schedule ```{r} #| include: false library(tidyverse) library(here) library(readxl) library(glue) library(downloadthis) library(fontawesome) library(gt) library(xfun) table_style <- function(data) { data %>% opt_table_lines(extent = "none") %>% opt_table_outline(style = "solid", width = px(3), color = "black") %>% tab_options( heading.border.bottom.color = "black", heading.border.bottom.style = "solid", table.border.top.color = "black", table_body.hlines.color = "black", table_body.border.top.color = "black", table_body.border.top.style = "solid", table_body.border.bottom.color = "black", table_body.border.bottom.style = "solid", column_labels.border.bottom.color = "black", column_labels.border.bottom.style = "solid", column_labels.border.top.color = "black", column_labels.background.color = "#56B4E9", table.width = pct(100), container.width = pct(100) ) } assign_links <- read_xlsx(here::here("nopublish", "schedule.xlsx"), sheet = "schedule") %>% select(Assigned, assigned_link) %>% drop_na() %>% filter(str_detect(Assigned, "Homework")) %>% mutate(link_assign = map2_chr(assigned_link, Assigned, ~paste0("\ ", xfun::embed_file(path = here("homeworks", .x), text = .y)))) %>% select(-assigned_link) due_links <- read_xlsx(here::here("nopublish", "schedule.xlsx"), sheet = "schedule") %>% select(Due, due_link) %>% drop_na() %>% filter(str_detect(Due, "Homework")) %>% mutate(link_due = map2_chr(due_link, Due, ~paste0("\ ", xfun::embed_file(path = here("homeworks", .x), text = .y)))) %>% select(-due_link) sched_1 <- read_xlsx(here::here("nopublish", "schedule.xlsx"), sheet = "schedule") %>% mutate( Reading = paste0(Reading, "(", reading_link, ")"), Slides = paste0(Slides, "(", slides_link, ")"), Lecture = paste0(Lecture, "(", lecture_link, ")"), Assigned = ifelse(str_detect(Assigned, "Homework"), Assigned, paste0(Assigned, "(", assigned_link, ")")), Due = ifelse(str_detect(Due, "Homework"), Due, paste0(Due, "(", due_link, ")")), Date = format(as.Date(Date), "%b-%d") ) %>% select(-ends_with("link"), -ends_with("shortcut"), -c(Topic, screenshot)) %>% mutate(across(everything(), ~ifelse(. == "NA(NA)", NA_character_, .))) %>% mutate(Lecture = ifelse(str_detect(Lecture, "fas"), Lecture, NA_character_)) %>% mutate(across(everything(), ~str_remove(., "\\(NA\\)"))) sched <- left_join(sched_1, assign_links) %>% left_join(due_links) %>% mutate( Assigned = case_when( str_detect(Assigned, "Homework") & str_detect(link_assign, "href") ~ link_assign, TRUE ~ Assigned), Due = case_when( str_detect(Due, "Homework") & str_detect(link_due, "href") ~ link_due, TRUE ~ Due)) %>% select(-c(link_assign, link_due)) %>% nest(data = c(Date, Reading, Slides, Lecture, Assigned, Due, lecture_passcode)) %>% mutate(lecture_passcode = map_chr(data, ~.$lecture_passcode[[1]]), data = map(data, ~select(., -lecture_passcode))) tbl_fx <- function(n){ sched %>% slice(n) %>% select(data) %>% unnest(cols = c(data)) %>% gt::gt() %>% fmt_markdown(columns = c(Reading, Slides, Lecture, Assigned, Due)) %>% fmt_missing( columns = everything(), missing_text = "" ) %>% cols_label( Date = md("") ) %>% tab_footnote( footnote = paste0("Passcode: ", sched$lecture_passcode[[n]]), locations = cells_body( columns = Lecture, rows = 1) ) %>% table_style() } ``` ### Before Week 1 Please complete the following **five** installs before our first class. Instructions for each are on the [Installs page](installs.qmd). (1) Install `R` (2) Install RStudio (3) Register a GitHub account (4) Install Git (5) Install GitKraken ### Week 1: Introduction ```{r} tbl_fx(1) %>% tab_footnote( footnote = "I do not rearrange my RStudio panes as he does.", locations = cells_body( columns = Assigned, rows = 1) ) ``` ### Week 2: Workflow ```{r} tbl_fx(2) ``` ### Week 3: `{ggplot2}` ```{r} tbl_fx(3) ``` ### Week 4: `{dplyr}` ```{r} tbl_fx(4) ``` ### Week 5: Quarto ```{r} tbl_fx(5) ``` ### Week 6: GitHub ```{r} tbl_fx(6) ``` ### Week 7: Mutating Joins ```{r} tbl_fx(7) ``` ### Week 8: Tidy Data ```{r} tbl_fx(8) ``` ### Week 9: Factors & Pull Request ```{r} tbl_fx(9) ``` ### Week 10: Presentations ```{r} tbl_fx(10) ``` ### Week 11: No class: Final papers due
